name: Protein-Packed Vegetarian Fried Rice
author: OwlsTheDragon
summary: This vegetarian fried rice is delicious and packed with protein; a nutrient that many vegetarians have trouble incorporating into their diets.
ingredients: ½ (12 ounce) package firm tofu, cubed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (8 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed
1 teaspoon sriracha hot sauce, or to taste
directions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add tofu, carrots, celery, onion, and garlic; cook and stir until vegetables are just soft; 5 to 10 minutes
Stir rice, egg, and spinach into the tofu mixture until egg is no longer runny, about 5 minutes
Stir in sriracha; season with salt and pepper
